comment.author: 21802566@N02
comment._content:
The J. N. Teal served along the Columbia River between Oregon and Washington.

This photo was taken in the locks at the Cascades, which is the town of Cascade Locks today.

comment.author: 34427466731@N01
comment._content: This image has been used in the indicommons.org post: Delivering the Mail

comment._content: Nice old photo. Added to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cascade_Locks,_Oregon Thanks for posting these!
